title: Fix Ink Exit Race Condition Using Static Component

features.description: repo list command uses <Static> for output preservation
steps: Step 1: Run 'skilluse repo list'
Step 2: Verify repository list is displayed
Step 3: Verify output persists in terminal history after command exits
Step 4: Verify no race condition (output not cleared)

features.description: repo command uses <Static> for output preservation
steps: Step 1: Run 'skilluse repo'
Step 2: Verify current repository info is displayed
Step 3: Verify output persists after exit

steps: Step 1: Run 'skilluse repo list' (or any async command)
